heading: HJR0034
0: JOINT RESOLUTION REMITTING ALL MONIES COLLECTED AS MOTOR VEHICLE USER'S CHARGED TO THE NATIONAL TREASURY UNDER A SPECIAL ACCOUNT IN THE GENERAL FUND TO BE EARMARKED SOLELY FOR THE PURPOSE OF CONSTRUCTION, UPGRADING, REPAIR AND REHABILITATION OF ROADS, BRIDGES AND ROAD DRAINAGE TO BE INCLUDED IN THE PROPOSED 2019 GENERAL APPROPRIATIONS ACT
principal-authors: MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA; CASTRO, FREDENIL "FRED" H.; SUAREZ, DANILO E.; ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G.;
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2019-01-30
history:
